input.sentences: the wife decided she wanted to go hiking .
she took her dog so that he could get exercise as well .
afterwards | they played along the beach .
the husband decided to take a selfie of himself with his wife .
the dogs settle in on the couch with the husband after a fun day away .
output.sentences: Today my wife and I decided to go hiking with our dogs.
All of us sure can use the exercise after this long winter.
We hiked all the way down to the beach and the dogs loved it.
To top it off my wife and myself even took a selfie.
After the long fun day we settled in at home and got a rest.
